name: Asmae Kirimov
welcome_section_title: Welcome to the law office of
welcome_section_subtitle: Your trusted legal partner in France
welcome_section_description_1: As a lawyer in Pau, I advise, assist and represent you in the fields of administrative law, international business law and everyday disputes. Drawing on my experience within law firms, the French administration and an administrative court, I founded my own practice to offer you rigorous, human and tailor-made support.
welcome_section_description_2: Holder of a Master's degree in European and international law, I appear before all administrative and judicial courts. I put my skills in immigration law, nationality law, urban planning law, civil service law, as well as civil liability and personal injury at your service. Based in Pau, I also offer support tailored to companies in the context of their international activities, in business and corporate law.
expertises_section_description_1: Expert legal advice and representation with clarity and professionalism.
expertises_section_description_2: Clear and committed legal support for immigration and nationality cases.
expertises_section_description_3: Professional legal support for civil servants and public services.
expertises_section_description_4: Expert and humane representation for compensation claims.
reviews_section_button: Leave me a review on Google
contact_section_form_error: Error sending message. Please try again later.
contact_section_form_error_too_many_requ: Too many requests. Please try again later.
cabinet_page_description_1: Graduate of the École des avocats Aliénor de Bordeaux and holder of a Master's degree in European and international law, Master KIRIMOV advises, assists and defends you before all administrative courts as well as before judicial courts.
cabinet_page_description_2: Master Kirimov also offers to defend your interests in various everyday disputes (conflicts related to the purchase or sale of movable or immovable property, neighborhood disputes, civil liability).
cabinet_page_description_3: Thanks to her professional experience in law firms, within the French administration or with an administrative court, Master Kirimov puts her advisory and litigation skills at your service in various areas of administrative law (immigration and nationality law, urban planning law, civil service law, etc.)
services_page_subfamily_1_1_title: Comprehensive support to structure, grow and secure your business.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_subtitle: We guide you through each strategic stage of your company's life, with an approach that is analytical, pragmatic and action-oriented:
services_page_subfamily_1_1_list_1_descr: Together, we develop a clear, coherent and ambitious vision, aligned with your personal and professional objectives.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_list_2_descr: We help you structure, optimize and grow your business sustainably.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_list_3_descr: We conduct sector studies, competitive intelligence and concrete recommendations to help you stand out.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_list_4_descr: We remain by your side in daily management and deployment of strategic actions.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_list_5_descr: Ongoing legal monitoring (holding AGMs, statutory updates...) to stay compliant with ease.
services_page_subfamily_1_1_footer_title: Clear vision, controlled growth, legal security:
services_page_subfamily_1_1_footer_descr: We combine strategic advice and legal rigor to give you peace of mind and performance.
services_page_subfamily_1_2_title: Anticipate, secure and succeed in your transmission operations.
services_page_subfamily_1_2_subtitle: Whether you are a seller or buyer, we support you at every stage of the operation, with legal and strategic expertise:
services_page_subfamily_1_2_list_1_descr: We advise you in building your negotiation strategy and assist you throughout the exchanges between parties.
services_page_subfamily_1_2_list_2_descr: Letters of intent (LOI), sale agreements, asset and liability warranties, and all essential ancillary agreements
services_page_subfamily_1_2_list_3_descr: Complete handling of post-sale legal and administrative procedures (registration formalities, statutory modifications, publication...).
services_page_subfamily_1_2_footer_descr: We help you protect your interests, secure the transaction, and create the conditions for a successful transition.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_title: Frame your activities and secure your commercial relationships.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_subtitle: We support you in managing your commercial operations with rigor, clarity and responsiveness, in order to protect your interests and strengthen the legal solidity of your company.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_1_descr: Strategic advice and comprehensive legal support (acquisition, sale, transmission).
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_2_descr: Drafting of documents, preliminary verifications, registration and publicity formalities.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_3_descr: Support on legal and tax aspects in the context of succession, donation or transfer between partners.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_4_descr: Contract drafting, securing sensitive clauses, administrative formalities.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_5_descr: Drafting, analysis or renewal, with particular attention to the interests of the lessor or lessee.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_6_descr: Negotiation, drafting and securing your contractual commitments.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_7_title: General and Particular Terms of Sale:
services_page_subfamily_1_3_list_7_descr: Tailor-made drafting compliant with regulations and adapted to your business.
services_page_subfamily_1_3_footer_title: A solid legal framework to develop your business safely.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_title: Optimize your taxation, secure your assets, clarify your partner relationships.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_subtitle: We support you in the strategic management of your taxation and in the legal structuring of your professional and personal assets, with a tailor-made approach.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_list_1_descr: In-depth analysis of your situation to legally reduce your tax burden, anticipate risks and take advantage of levers adapted to your business.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_list_2_descr: Implementation and securing of the Dutreil Pact, to tax-optimize the transmission of your business in a family or professional context.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_list_3_title: Tax & social status of the manager
services_page_subfamily_1_4_list_3_descr: Analysis and arbitration between self-employed and employee status, remuneration structuring (salary vs dividends), coordination with a holding company if needed.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_list_4_descr: Drafting and securing shareholder agreements, protocols, governance charters... to anticipate conflicts and effectively frame company life.
services_page_subfamily_1_4_footer_title: Comprehensive support combining tax performance, legal stability and estate strategy.
services_page_subfamily_2_1_subtitle: Analysis of your file and drafting of an appeal
services_page_subfamily_2_1_list_1_descr: Study of your personal situation and reasons for refusal.
services_page_subfamily_2_1_list_2_descr: Drafting of a reasoned appeal to the administration.
services_page_subfamily_2_1_list_3_descr: Referral to the competent judge in case of maintained refusal.
services_page_subfamily_2_1_footer_title: Each situation is studied with precision to maximize your chances of success.
services_page_subfamily_2_2_subtitle: Procedures, appeals and respect for family rights
services_page_subfamily_2_2_list_1_descr: I assist you in preparing the file and procedures to legally bring your relatives to France.
services_page_subfamily_2_2_list_2_descr: Intervention in case of refusal or complex request by the administration.
services_page_subfamily_2_2_list_3_descr: Specific support for beneficiaries of international protection.
services_page_subfamily_2_2_footer_title: My role is to ensure the regularity of the procedure and respect for family rights.
services_page_subfamily_2_3_subtitle: Representation and defense of your right to protection
services_page_subfamily_2_3_list_1_descr: I help you build a coherent and legally sound narrative.
services_page_subfamily_2_3_list_2_descr: I represent you and prepare a reasoned file in response to OFPRA's refusal.
services_page_subfamily_2_3_list_3_descr: Each step aims to defend your need for protection.
services_page_subfamily_2_3_footer_title: My intervention guarantees legal rigor and respect for your rights.
services_page_subfamily_2_4_subtitle: Defense of your rights against prefectural decisions
services_page_subfamily_2_4_list_1_title: Application or renewal of residence permit:
services_page_subfamily_2_4_list_1_descr: I intervene to ensure the completeness of your file and anticipate risks of refusal.
services_page_subfamily_2_4_list_2_descr: I defend you before the authorities and accompany you in contentious procedures.
services_page_subfamily_2_4_list_3_descr: I help you obtain a permit adapted to your situation.
services_page_subfamily_2_4_footer_title: My objective: preserve your right to stay in France.
services_page_subfamily_3_1_subtitle: Support from the first summons or measure
services_page_subfamily_3_1_list_1_descr: Suspension, reprimand, demotion or dismissal, I ensure respect for due process and defense rights.
services_page_subfamily_3_1_list_2_descr: I initiate procedures to contest unjustified or irregular decisions.
services_page_subfamily_3_1_list_3_descr: I support you upstream to anticipate disciplinary actions.
services_page_subfamily_3_1_footer_title: My objective: ensure rigorous defense adapted to each situation.
services_page_subfamily_3_2_subtitle: Recognition and recourse in case of workplace suffering
services_page_subfamily_3_2_list_1_descr: I help you establish the facts and gather necessary evidence.
services_page_subfamily_3_2_list_2_descr: I support you in having the administration's fault recognized.
services_page_subfamily_3_2_list_3_descr: I defend you rigorously before competent bodies.
services_page_subfamily_3_2_footer_title: My objective: obtain reparation and restoration of your rights.
services_page_subfamily_3_3_list_1_descr: I help you gather necessary documents to have your situation recognized.
services_page_subfamily_3_3_list_2_title: Appeals in case of administration refusal:
services_page_subfamily_3_3_list_2_descr: I represent you before the administration or competent courts.
services_page_subfamily_3_3_list_3_descr: I support you to guarantee your rights during your leave and obtain reparation.
services_page_subfamily_3_3_footer_title: My objective: have your rights recognized and secure your professional path.
